==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|type=211}}

===Etymology===
Literally: surrounded on four sides by the songs of [[w:Chu (state)|Chu]]
: During the [[w:Chu-Han contention#End_of_the_War|Chu-Han contention]], [[w:Xiang Yu|Xiang Yu]] found himself besieged in the city of Gaixia ([[垓]][[下]]), by the coalition force of Han and the other kings. Jiujiang fell to Ying Bu and Liu Jia the preceding month, and most of the [[w:Kingdom of Chu|Kingdom of Chu]] was occupied by the Han army. When he heard the besieging troops singing songs in the [[w:Chu (state)|Chu]] accent, Xiang Yu knew his kingdom had fallen.
